name: PEF_FLO_DATA
description: This table contains data on patient-entered flowsheet component information.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: This column stores the unique identifier for the summary/episode block record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HSB_PEF_FLO_ID
columns.description: This column stores the ID of the patient-entered flowsheet component.

columns.name: HSB_PEF_FLO_ID_DISP_NAME
columns.description: The display name given to the flowsheet group/row.

columns.name: PEF_MIN_VALUE
columns.description: This is the minimum allowable value for the patient-entered flowsheet component.

columns.name: PEF_MAX_VALUE
columns.description: This is the maximum allowable value for the patient-entered flowsheet component.
